title: This little pig went to market
creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Luci Clark, South Australian Film Corporation and Newfilms
brief_description: Carcass classification has taken much of the guesswork out of pig marketing. As a more objective measure in assessing the quality of the pork, classification is better for both producer and consumer. Explains the benefits to the farmer, and the way modern computers program and store production details. Cast includes Brian Moore, Flo Watson, Peter Brechin, Darcy Button, Keith Arnfield.
